languages.text: "Не сомневайтесь, я больше не подведу вас. И в знак своей решимости я должен кое-что сделать".
"Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."
languages.original_text: "Не сомневайтесь, я больше не подведу вас. И в знак своей решимости я должен кое-что сделать".

traits.locale_text: "Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."
"Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."
"Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."
"Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."
"Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."
"Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."

languages.text: 「ご安心を。二度とあなたを失望させません。その決意の証として、私が果たすべきことがあります」
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."

traits.locale_text: 「ご安心を。二度とあなたを失望させません。その決意の証として、私が果たすべきことがあります」

languages.text: "Seid versichert, ich werde Euch nicht noch einmal enttäuschen. Und um das zu beweisen, muss ich noch etwas erledigen."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."

traits.locale_text: "Seid versichert, ich werde Euch nicht noch einmal enttäuschen. Und um das zu beweisen, muss ich noch etwas erledigen."

languages.text: « N'ayez crainte, je ne vous décevrai plus. Pour vous prouver ma bonne volonté, j'aimerais vous confier quelque chose à mon sujet. »
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."

traits.locale_text: « N'ayez crainte, je ne vous décevrai plus. Pour vous prouver ma bonne volonté, j'aimerais vous confier quelque chose à mon sujet. »

languages.text: «Pierda cuidado, que no le volveré a fallar. Y como prueba de mi intención, hay algo que debo hacer».
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."

traits.locale_text: «Pierda cuidado, que no le volveré a fallar. Y como prueba de mi intención, hay algo que debo hacer».

languages.text: “放心，我不会再让你失望了。而且为了证明我的决心，有件事情我非做不可。”
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."

traits.locale_text: “放心，我不会再让你失望了。而且为了证明我的决心，有件事情我非做不可。”

languages.text: "İçiniz rahat olsun, sizi bir daha asla hayal kırıklığına uğratmayacağım. Ciddiyetimin kanıtı olarak yapmam gereken bir şey var."
languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."

traits.locale_text: "İçiniz rahat olsun, sizi bir daha asla hayal kırıklığına uğratmayacağım. Ciddiyetimin kanıtı olarak yapmam gereken bir şey var."

languages.original_text: "Rest assured, I won't fail you again. And, as proof of my intent, there is something I must do."
